committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to impose a moratorium on certain actions of the Interstate Commerce Commission.

summary.text: Prohibits the Interstate Commerce Commission, until after FY 1985, from acting on applications submitted after October 1, 1983, with respect to the limitations on intermodal ownership (ownership and control of different types of common carriers).

titles.title: A bill to impose a moratorium on certain actions of the Interstate Commerce Commission.
